page.title: 10FARMERS WIFE
page.content: A farmer's wife in {West Torrington gets up shortly before 7am, and is then occupied with packing lunches and preparing breakfast for the family. She and the three children leave home at 8.10am to meet the school buses in {West Torrington,}about a mile away. By 8.30am she is home, doing housework and preparing breakfast for her husband when he comes in at 9.30am. The rest of the morning is spent in housework, except one morning, when she shops and collects money for the men's wages from the bank in Lincoln, 15 miles away. She spends another morning, doing office work for the farm. Lunch is usually a snack meal when her husband comes in at about 1pm.
